short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mship2u物流代运助手。您可以在淘宝已买到宝贝的页面，直接提交代收货信息到Mship2u物流网站。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
【 How to use 】
1. Ship For Me - You can submit the tracking information directly to mship2u.com by clicking “Add Parcel” on the Taobao/Tmall page where the product has bought. In addition, you can also edit the added package.
2. Browse the website - Click the Mship2u icon on the right side of the browser and a small window will appear to display the mship2u.com website.

【 Our service 】
Mship2u Provide simple, reasonable, safe and fast shipping on Sea,  Air and Express services, China to Malaysia.

【 Official Website 】
https://mship2u.com

Thank you very much for using Mship2u Chrome app.
With your support, we will continue to do it better.
